com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.api.textindex.document

Class DeleteFromTextIndexPollingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.job.AbstractPollingService
      • com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.api.textindex.document.DeleteFromTextIndexPollingService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeleteFromTextIndexService

    public class DeleteFromTextIndexPollingService
extends AbstractPollingService
implements DeleteFromTextIndexService
    Implementation of DeleteFromTextIndexService which polls for job completion.

    The destroy method should be called when the service is no longer needed.
